Selected work

Boardmatch

Salesforce · B2B SaaS

Design of a learning platform for professionals, focused on improving user flows and content discoverability.

Avolta

SharePoint · Enterprise product

Redesign of internal tools to simplify complex workflows and increase adoption across teams.

Bladderboss

Mobile app · Healthcare

Product discovery and UX design for a healthcare app supporting patients in daily self-management.

Product design is not about screens. It’s about decisions.

How I work

01 Problem framing

I start by understanding users, business goals and constraints, aligning with stakeholders to define the real problem to solve.

02 Design & Collaboration

I explore solutions through flows, wireframes and prototypes, working closely with product managers and developers.

03 Validation & Iteration

I test assumptions, gather feedback and iterate based on user needs, technical constraints and product impact.

About me

I’m a Product Designer with over 4 years of experience working on digital products in complex environments, mainly within B2B, SaaS and enterprise platforms.

My background combines UX research, UI design, design systems and frontend development, which allows me to understand both the strategic and the technical side of a product.

I work at the UX intersection of user needs, business goals and technical constraints, collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver products that are not only usable, but also effective and scalable.

Have a complex product?

Let’s work together

I'm currently open to new opportunities and collaborations.
